paragraph.value: Existing systems (RQ3) are evaluated and results Polyglot (Al-Rfou et al., 2013) overall performs better than DKIE (Derczynski et al., 2014).2 The best system is our cross-lingual transfer NER from MEDIUM source data paired with SMALL amounts of gold data.  Per-entity evaluation shows that the neural Bilstm tagger outperforms Polyglot except for Location, which is consistent across evaluation sets.
